content.title: Fortification Work
content.setup:
{LORD_NAME} wants earthworks by nightfall. Trenches, palisades, something the enemy can't just ride through.

The ground is hard. The men are tired. The deadline is real.

options.text: Work alongside the men, lead by example
Supervise and direct, maximize efficiency
Focus on the critical sections only
Push the men harder, get it done early
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

content.title: Siege Engine Repair
content.setup:
The trebuchet arm cracked. Counter-weight's bent. {LORD_NAME} wants it firing again by morning.

"Can you fix it, {PLAYER_NAME}?"

options.text: Full repair, do it right
Patch it — it'll hold for a few shots
Improvise with available materials
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Report it beyond repair

content.title: Bridge Assessment
content.setup:
The bridge looks old. The army's heavy. {LORD_NAME} needs to know — can it hold?

"Your expertise, {PLAYER_NAME}. Speak plainly."

options.text: Inspect thoroughly, give accurate assessment
Reinforce the weak points first
Test it with a small group first
It'll hold (confident guess)
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

content.title: Mining Operation
content.setup:
{LORD_NAME} wants to mine the walls. Tunnel under, collapse it, open a breach.

Dangerous work. Collapses. Counter-mines. Defenders above.

options.text: Lead the mining crew personally
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

options.text: Direct from the surface, let others dig
Shore up the tunnel properly, slow but safe
Volunteer for the breach moment
options.outcome: You take the risk and see it through.

content.title: Camp Layout
content.setup:
New campsite. {SECOND_SHORT} wants it organized right — latrines downhill, fires safe distance, wagons protecting the perimeter.

"You've got an eye for this. Lay it out."

options.text: Plan it carefully, explain to the sergeants
Quick layout, trust experience
Walk the ground first, find the best spots
Delegate to the sergeants, approve their work
